attributes.action: An unwhipped debate on a referendum on the U.K.'s membership of the EU.
attributes.additional_details: The debate on 24.10.2011 was subject to a three line whip. Sovereignty of this nation lies with the people, not the government. The Prime minister and cabinet along with all other MP's are our servants, not our masters. It is time for the people of this nation to be listened to over our membership of the undemocratic EU.
